document.full_text: briton luke donald shrugged off the specter of the masters' par-3 contest jinx by winning the annual short-course contest wednesday on the eve of the championship.
document.title: donald wins par-3 contest
lines_and_colors: briton luke donald shrugged off the specter of the masters' par-3 contest jinx by winning the annual short-course contest wednesday on the eve of the championship.
